## Call.addEventListener() method

Ringing event. Raised when the call has begun to ring.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addEventListener(ringingEvent: Call.Event.Ringing, listener: Call.Listener.Ringing): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ringingEvent | [Call.Event.Ringing](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_namespace.event_enum.md) | The raised event string. |
|  listener | [Call.Listener.Ringing](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_namespace.listener_namespace.ringing_typealias.md) | A listener function that will be invoked when the event is raised. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

- The call object.
